Example Ontology

Version: 1.0.0

Description: An example ontology for testing rontodoc.

Abstract

An example ontology for testing rontodoc.

Classes

Man

IRI: http://example.org/ontology/Man

Superclasses: Person

Disjoint With: Woman

Person

IRI: http://example.org/ontology/Person

A human being.

Student

IRI: http://example.org/ontology/Student

Superclasses: Person

Woman

IRI: http://example.org/ontology/Woman

Superclasses: Person

Disjoint With: Man

Object Properties

knows

IRI: http://example.org/ontology/knows

A relationship between two people.

Data Properties

age

IRI: http://example.org/ontology/age

The age of a person.

Annotation Properties

definition

IRI: http://example.org/ontology/definition

A definition of a term.

Named Individuals

John

IRI: http://example.org/ontology/John

An instance of Person.
